Snuggle SuperFresh Original 3in1 Odor elimination to help fight body, outdoor, and pet odors
Great for all types of clothing including activewear, workout clothes, and sleepwear
Releases a powerful fresh scent with Snuggle SuperFresh 3in1 In-Wash Scent Booster Beads in the Original scent

Complete your laundry regimen and use our scent beads with SuperFresh liquid fabric conditioner for long lasting scent and SuperFresh dryer sheets for static control.
body.description: Wondering how to make your laundry smell good? Snuggle SuperFresh Original Scent Shakes laundry scent booster feature the Snuggly Freshness your family loves plus our odor-fighting technology for fresh and clean clothes all day, every day. These in-wash scent boosters infuse laundry with extraordinary freshness that lasts up to 100 days*! Complete your laundry regimen and use our scent beads with SuperFresh liquid fabric conditioner for long lasting scent and SuperFresh dryer sheets for static control. Pour directly into your washer before adding your clothes. Snuggle SuperFresh Scent Shakes scent boosters are great for all types of clothes including activewear, workout clothes, and sleepwear. This package includes one 19 ounce bottle of Snuggle SuperFresh Original scent booster laundry beads. *Out of storage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Snuggle SuperFresh fabric softener is designed to fight hard to get out odors, soften, and deliver long-lasting freshness. Snuggle SuperFresh scent booster laundry beads provide long lasting freshness. Snuggle SuperFresh Dryer Sheets features the Snuggly Softness you love, plus odor eliminating technology. It doesn't just mask tough odor, it helps eliminate it and releases Snuggly freshness.

SuperFresh Original Scent Booster Beads SuperFresh Original 2X Liquid SuperFresh Original Dryer Sheets SuperFresh Spring Burst Scent Booster Beads SuperFresh Spring Burst 2X Liquid SuperFresh Spring Burst Dryer Sheets Odor Eliminating Technology ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Static Control ✓ ✓ 2X Concentrated ✓ ✓ Long Lasting Freshness ✓ ✓ Snuggly Softness ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Already a Snuggle product fan, I use fabric sheets, liquid softner, plug-ins etc. I love these scent beads more then the toss in scent booster. The fragrance is more concentrated, and seems to last longer. The only complaint I have is that the size needs to be bigger. I use a full cap for my loads so the bottle goes quickly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, something that takes away the dog smell!!
reviews.reviewText: Our dog loves to sleep on my son's bed. Teenage boy plus dog, I could not get the smell out of the sheets and blankets no matter what soap I used. This is the only product I've found that doesn't seem to just mask it, but completely gets rid of it and makes it smell amazing!! So thankful I found this product!! Highly recommend if you have stubborn odors or not! This works great and the container was much bigger than I anticipated! Lasts quite a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love this nice, "baby" smell. I swear to God do NOT use the recommended amount or you will be overwhelmed with the scent. I literally use 1 tsp or so per load and it's just the right amount that isn't too overpowering. A container of this lasts a LONG time this way and does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell, lasts a long time!
reviews.reviewText: Thus smelled so good. I washed some blankets with these scent beads and weeks later I could still smell the wonderful scent. I did happen to use 3 capfuls, though. I'm not sure if I would get the same results with 1 cupful, but I was happy with my results I would use 3 again. :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells great, but terrible freaking packaging!!!
reviews.reviewText: Uggghhhh!!!! The product smells GREAT!!! But seriously???????? I opened the box and they were complete spilled everywhere!Do better! Place better tape or something to hold the top down! Sheesh!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The scent that stays!
reviews.reviewText: My goodness! This line is my absolute favorite! I had used Downey for years but happened upon this one day. Fell in love and have been with it since!! I use the scent beads and the fabric softener both. It is most amazing! Please don’t get rid of it!!!Customer for life!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super smelly and fun to use
reviews.reviewText: I love these but they're expensive. The scent is delightful and fresh. Still smells when I take the garment out of my drawer a week later. And when I wash my bedding in it, it fills my whole bedroom with fresh scent. I love that !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such an AMAZING smelling laundry scent booster
reviews.reviewText: I think this scent booster is one of the BEST smelling ever! Its such a fresh and clean scent, but not only that, its strong, but in my opinion, in a GOOD way. So many times I have gotten things that smell decent or ok or I can barely smell them, but this one, everyone can smell. I always get compliments on things that I have washed with this product in it!

I love the smell of Snuggle fabric softener but it never lasted longer than wash day so I tried these. They smell so good! They’re definitely the most affordable option and I think the smell lasts longer than Downey and Gain. They don’t even make it passed the dryer. This scent stays strong. It especially does if you hang dry. I will say the snuggle pods are better, but they’re hard to find and super expensive! Overall these are good.
The lid was off when it arrived at the post office. They were falling out if the box all the way home.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fresh clean scent lasts for weeks before wearing and the lasts while wearing
reviews.reviewText: I use for regular laundry. It's better than fresheners that only are for every day laundry.
Ça sent tellement bon! Et le prix avait vraiment de l'allure. J'adore!
